data.name: Bravest Burden
data.detailed_description:
Bravest Burden is a multiplayer action RPG in the classic isometric style. Together, you must protect the last living light in a world of darkness - whilst sharing it to survive.

PROTECT THE LIGHT

Many creatures in this world will want what you have, or may even seek to destroy it. Travel between safe-zones as a tight-knit group of adventurers and survivalists. Change who is responsible for the light - bicker over who should bare its burden and why.

KNOW YOUR ENEMIES

Not all in this world can be easily felled with the swing of a battle-axe, some will require creative solutions. Will one among you have the ingenuity needed to survive?

GROW YOUR CHARACTER

Create your character, choosing from four classes: Brute, Ranger, Druid or Thief.

Bring a unique flavour to each of your groups expeditions while completing Personal Quests in order to improve, change or aid your character. Decide between meaningful Traits & Abilities as you progress.

UNEARTH RARITIES

Discover new weapons, equipment and items. Tinker with your weapon of choice to evolve your own combat style.

LEARN MAGIC

Experience magical feedback from the world after completing rituals or channelling spirits. Understand the meaning of these & use them to your advantage. Learning such secrets will empower you - but beware - it can also bring unwanted attention.

A BEAUTIFUL, BRUTAL WORLD

Explore a colourful, diverse world filled with a huge variety of areas. The lush Thilliath Forest, the wastes of the fallen Rosemarble Empire, and the frozen tundra of the Korvathi Mountains are just a few of the challenging biomes that you will have to expedition through, with equally varied inhabitants to encounter.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP or later
  • Processor: Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 MB graphics memory and directx 9.0c compatible gpu
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Discrete GPU capable of directx 9.0c
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
